ksql: CREATE STREAM "CIQ000000017_out_charge_raw_stream" (MQTT_TOPIC VARCHAR KEY, charge VARCHAR) WITH (KAFKA_TOPIC='CIQ000000017_out_charge_raw', VALUE_FORMAT='DELIMITED'); CREATE STREAM "CIQ000000017_out_charge" WITH (VALUE_FORMAT='AVRO') AS SELECT CHARGE AS CHARGE, SUBSTRING(MQTT_TOPIC,1,LEN(MQTT_TOPIC)-11) AS ID, AS_VALUE(SUBSTRING(MQTT_TOPIC,1,LEN(MQTT_TOPIC)-11)) AS CLIENT_ID, ROWTIME AS TIMESTAMP FROM "CIQ000000017_out_charge_raw_stream" PARTITION BY SUBSTRING(MQTT_TOPIC,1,LEN(MQTT_TOPIC)-11);
